name: Improved Charging Hurler
text: Every muscle in your body adds its force to your thrown weapons.
benefit: When you use Charging Hurler, your target can be at any range up to your weapon’s maximum range. If your target is within 30 feet, you gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls.
normal: Using Charging Hurler requires you to end your movement within 30 feet of your opponent.
staminaText: When using Charging Hurler against a target within 30 feet, you can spend up to 2 stamina points. When you do, the bonus on your damage roll for that attack increases by double the number of stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 你利用身上每一块肌肉来增强你的投掷威力。
benefit_zh: 当你使用“冲锋投掷”时，你可以在与目标距离为武器最大射程以内的任何地方停止移动。如果你的目标在30尺范围内，你的伤害骰获得+2加值。
normal_zh: 进行“冲锋投掷”时移动终点必须位于目标附近30尺内。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用冲锋投掷UC对抗一个30尺内的目标时，你可以消耗至多2点耐力。当你这样做时，加在这次攻击上的加值提升两倍于你消耗的耐力的点数。
